participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Eleanor is a lively and spirited individual who enjoys the finer things in life, such as wine and dancing. She has a nostalgic view of the world, cherishing memories from a time before modern entertainment.
participant_1.background: i am 100 years old. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i am very strong for my age. i feel like i might live forever. i remember when nobody had a television.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Liam is an enthusiastic and sociable person who loves to celebrate life with friends and family. He is excited about his upcoming wedding and enjoys exploring new dining experiences.
participant_2.background: my favorite singer is taylor swift. i am 24 years old. i'm getting married in the spring. i love eating out with friends.
